name: Equalis
tag_list: open-source, science-community, engineering-community, mathematics, numerical-computing, modeling-and-simulation, matlab-alternative
overview: Equalis is the leading provider of numerical analysis, visualization and simulation software solutions for engineers and scientists based on the worldâ€™s leading open source numerical computation platform, Scilab. Having been downloaded over 3,500,000 times, Scilab is used extensively throughout the world in both industry and research, including companies such as; ArcelorMittal, CNES, EDF, IDT, Peugeot, to name a few.
